name: blogging-app
description: - `--dev` use to make Development dependency. - Dev dependency is required only in development enviornment. - Ex: `npm i nodemon --dev` - It will not be used in Production enviornment. - We haave used `Partials` Folder Which includes all the files which are partial for many other files. - Steps :     - Created Models     - Created Views      - Created Router to handle request     - Hashed the password using crypto library     - Worked on Signup page     - Worked on Signin page     - Signup and signin done
